26#include <sys/cdefs.h>
27__KERNEL_RCSID(0, "$NetBSD: nouveau_nvkm_engine_disp_dmacgf119.c,v 1.2 2018/08/27 04:58:31 riastradh Exp $");
28
29#include "dmacnv50.h"
30#include "rootnv50.h"
31
32#include <core/ramht.h>
33#include <subdev/timer.h>
34
35int
36gf119_disp_dmac_bind(struct nv50_disp_dmac *chan,
37 struct nvkm_object *object, u32 handle)
38{
39 return nvkm_ramht_insert(chan->base.root->ramht, object,
40 chan->base.chid, -9, handle,
41 chan->base.chid << 27 | 0x00000001);
42}
43
44static void
45gf119_disp_dmac_fini(struct nv50_disp_dmac *chan)
46{
47 struct nv50_disp *disp = chan->base.root->disp;
48 struct nvkm_subdev *subdev = &disp->base.engine.subdev;
49 struct nvkm_device *device = subdev->device;
50 int chid = chan->base.chid;
51
52 /* deactivate channel */
53 nvkm_mask(device, 0x610490 + (chid * 0x0010), 0x00001010, 0x00001000);
54 nvkm_mask(device, 0x610490 + (chid * 0x0010), 0x00000003, 0x00000000);
55 if (nvkm_msec(device, 2000,
56 if (!(nvkm_rd32(device, 0x610490 + (chid * 0x10)) & 0x001e0000))
57 break;
58 ) < 0) {
59 nvkm_error(subdev, "ch %d fini: %08x\n", chid,
60 nvkm_rd32(device, 0x610490 + (chid * 0x10)));
61 }
62
63 /* disable error reporting and completion notification */
64 nvkm_mask(device, 0x610090, 0x00000001 << chid, 0x00000000);
65 nvkm_mask(device, 0x6100a0, 0x00000001 << chid, 0x00000000);
66}
67
68static int
69gf119_disp_dmac_init(struct nv50_disp_dmac *chan)
70{
71 struct nv50_disp *disp = chan->base.root->disp;
72 struct nvkm_subdev *subdev = &disp->base.engine.subdev;
73 struct nvkm_device *device = subdev->device;
74 int chid = chan->base.chid;
75
76 /* enable error reporting */
77 nvkm_mask(device, 0x6100a0, 0x00000001 << chid, 0x00000001 << chid);
78
79 /* initialise channel for dma command submission */
80 nvkm_wr32(device, 0x610494 + (chid * 0x0010), chan->push);
81 nvkm_wr32(device, 0x610498 + (chid * 0x0010), 0x00010000);
82 nvkm_wr32(device, 0x61049c + (chid * 0x0010), 0x00000001);
83 nvkm_mask(device, 0x610490 + (chid * 0x0010), 0x00000010, 0x00000010);
84 nvkm_wr32(device, 0x640000 + (chid * 0x1000), 0x00000000);
85 nvkm_wr32(device, 0x610490 + (chid * 0x0010), 0x00000013);
86
87 /* wait for it to go inactive */
88 if (nvkm_msec(device, 2000,
89 if (!(nvkm_rd32(device, 0x610490 + (chid * 0x10)) & 0x80000000))
90 break;
91 ) < 0) {
92 nvkm_error(subdev, "ch %d init: %08x\n", chid,
93 nvkm_rd32(device, 0x610490 + (chid * 0x10)));
94 return -EBUSY;
95 }
96
97 return 0;
98}
99
100const struct nv50_disp_dmac_func
101gf119_disp_dmac_func = {
102 .init = gf119_disp_dmac_init,
103 .fini = gf119_disp_dmac_fini,
104 .bind = gf119_disp_dmac_bind,
105};
106
